text: Allan Rich (born Benjamin Norman Schultz; February 8, 1926 â€“ August 22, 2020) was an American character actor, author, acting coach and activist. He was born in New York City. He starred in Serpico, Disclosure and Quiz Show. Rich was one of the many alleged communist sympathizers blacklisted in the 1950s Hollywood blacklist. Rich died on August 22, 2020 in Englewood, New Jersey from dementia-related problems, aged 94.Allan Rich, Character Actor Who Overcame the Blacklist, Dies at 94 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Educators from New York City Category:American activists Category:Actors from New York City
title: Allan Rich
